title: Disney Plus Removes Beloved Marvel Series Without Warning
description:
One of the difficulties with streaming services is that they often remove content without warning. It can be as simple as licensing issues or a studio licensing a title to another service. For this particular Marvel series, however, Disney Plus didn’t give any explanation for its removal. The fan-favorite animated series was removed altogether from [...]

The post Disney Plus Removes Beloved Marvel Series Without Warning appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: ‘Doctor Who’ Faces Backlash For Asking Alien Its Pronouns
description:
The BBC series Doctor Who has always been recognized as a progressive example of sci-fi entertainment. In more recent years, however, the show began facing backlash for being interpreted as “woke” entertainment. Now Doctor Who is facing backlash on X for an episode where an alien is asked for its pronouns. As you can see [...]

title: Marvel’s Kevin Feige Confirms Robert Downey Jr.’s Iron Man MCU Future
description:
Many Marvel fans have been hopeful that Robert Downey Jr.’s Iron Man could someday return to the MCU. The fan-favorite character, who helped launch the shared cinematic universe, sacrificed himself during the events of Avengers: Endgame. Now Marvel Studios boss Kevin Feige has confirmed the fate of Iron Man. He spoke recently about the character’s [...]
